title: Understanding Entropy Change
text: When a sealed container of ammonium nitrate is exploded, what happens to the physical state of the reactants and products? Does the entropy increase, decrease, or stay the same?

title: Observing Phase Change
text: Consider the phase change from solid or liquid to gas. Would you expect the entropy to increase or decrease?

title: Determining Entropy Change
text: Does converting a solid or liquid into gas generally lead to an increase in the randomness or the disorder of the system?

title: Entropy and Molecular Disorder
text: When a process involves an increase in molecular disorder, would that process have a positive or negative entropy change? Consider the definition of entropy.

title: Analyzing the Explosive Reaction
text: Given that the explosion leads to the release of gaseous products from a more ordered state, what is the sign of the entropy change?
